title: Forbidden Fruit
description: Emilia Benton, a nun minding her business is witness to a murder. Joshua Black, assassin, sent to kill the young nun. So starts the struggles of a young innocent nun being exposed to a world and an assassin who has set his eyes on the young nun...and not in a good way.Dark Erotica...Order of EscortForbidden FruitThe Brother's BlackThe Blackest HeartThe This book contains material of a violent nature, forced sex and submission, and abuse. It is recommended for readers aged 18 years and over. If this material offends please refrain from reading.
author: E.L. Beth
